sentences.en: Bulky clothes tend to hinder movement.
sentences.cn: 肥大的衣服常常碍手碍脚.

sentences.en: Don't hinder him in his work.
Don't hinder me in my work.
Don't hinder me when I am trying to work.
sentences.cn: 我要工作的时候别妨碍我.

sentences.en: His career has been hindered by injury.
sentences.cn: 由于受伤，他的事业受到了阻碍。

sentences.en: I could not hinder myself : Heathcliff , shake hands at least!
sentences.cn: 希斯克利夫, 至少握握手吧!

sentences.en: I could not hinder myself from pondering on the question - Had he had fair play?
sentences.cn: 我自己禁不住在思忖着,他可曾受到公平的待遇?

sentences.en: Landslides and bad weather are continuing to hinder the arrival of relief supplies to the area.
sentences.cn: 滑坡和恶劣天气仍在阻碍救援物资运送到该地区。

sentences.en: Nobody wants to hinder your doing that.
sentences.cn: 谁也不想阻止你做那件事.

sentences.en: policies that will hinder rather than help families
sentences.cn: 对家庭有害无益的政策

sentences.en: The heat did not hinder me from enjoying the delightful scenery above and below.
sentences.cn: 这种热并不阻碍我享受这上上下下的悦人美景.

sentences.en: They divided the deer's carcass, the hunter taking the hinder parts.
sentences.cn: 他们将鹿的躯体一分为二, 猎手分得后面部分.

sentences.en: They went through the rooms, being careful to touch nothing, as they did not want to hinder the police in their search for fingerprints.
sentences.cn: 他们走遍了各个房间, 小心翼翼不去碰任何东西, 因为他们不想妨碍警察寻找指纹.

sentences.en: Unfortunately these drugs are quite toxic and hinder the body's ability to fight off infection.
sentences.cn: 可惜的是，这些药物毒性很大，会削弱身体对感染的抵抗力。

sentences.en: We will neither help nor hinder it.
sentences.cn: 我们将既不助长它,也不阻止它.

sentences.en: With Nabin as a screen , there was nothing to hinder the flow of my pen.
sentences.cn: 有了纳宾做幌子,我这支笔就可以畅所欲言地发挥了.

words.tran_cn: 最后面的，最靠近后方的

trans.tran_en: situated at or further towards the back or rear; posterior
to make it difficult for something to develop or succeed
to make it difficult for something to develop or succeed
